parameters.query: INSERT INTO ai_extraction_tasks (tenant_id, appeal_id, entity_config_id, entity_type, device_index, input_message, status, raw_response, parsed_result, completed_at) VALUES ('{{ $json.task.tenant_id }}'::uuid, '{{ $json.task.appeal_id }}'::uuid, {{ $json.task.entity_config_id ? "'" + $json.task.entity_config_id + "'::uuid" : 'NULL' }}, '{{ $json.task.entity_type }}', {{ $json.task.device_index || 0 }}, '{{ $json.task.input_message.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'completed', '{{ $json.raw_output.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', '{{ JSON.stringify($json.result).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb, now()) RETURNING id

parameters.jsCode: return { message: 'No tasks', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };
